description.en: Monetha is a self-sovereign digital identity designed to ease and safeguard your interactions in the digital world while enabling users to utilize your data's value.

ico_data.short_desc: Mix of PayPal and Trustpilot on Ethereum Blockchain
ico_data.description: Decentralised trust and reputation system (DTRS), powered by smart contracts, works flawlessly with Monethaâ€™s payment processor. We let the buyer see trustworthy and transparent reviews made by previous customers. Based on the information saved during the transaction, clients and merchants will be able to file/solve a claim, rate each other, view ratings etc. Their history is then recorded onto the immutable Ethereum blockchain so that others can make well-informed commercial decisions.
